content: learn how to crochet the granny ripple / chevron stitch and how to crochet a border around it you can use any yarn and hook you would like below is what i used for my blanket for my blanket i used hayfield bonus dk with a 4mm hook in the following shades ladybird burnt orange cornfield turquoise neon blue & electric pink i used approximately 2 300 - 2 500 meters of dk weight yarn for the entire project my blanket measures approximately 39 inches 99cm wide by 48 inches 125cm long
